mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe that powerful tools should be accessible to everyone, everywhere, without compromising privacy or requiring expensive software.
mission.goal: Toolkit Lab was created to provide a free, fast, and privacy-focused suite of web tools. No installation required, everything runs in your browser.

private.title: 100% Private
private.description: Your files never leave your device. All processing (conversion, editing, transfer) happens locally in your browser.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: No upload/download delays. Processing starts instantly and runs at full speed on your hardware using WebAssembly.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Once loaded, the tools work even without an internet connection (PWA). Perfect for travel or limited connectivity.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: Built with modern web technologies: React, TypeScript, WebAssembly, and WebRTC. We believe in transparent development.

free_forever.title: Free Forever
free_forever.description: This tool is and will always be 100% free. We believe in democratizing access to powerful tools. Our service is supported by non-intrusive advertisements.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have feedback, suggestions, or found a bug? We'd love to hear from you!
